about_the_game:
The Last Crypt is a top down roguelite survivors game, with additional notes of bullet hell.

You're playing as a hero of the underworld. Other races of the world successfully banished all evil beings hundreds of years ago. But now remaining forces of Death herself finally decided to change that. It's time to restore the lost power of the underworld.

The Last Crypt offers a big collection of combinations between different skills, upgrades and guns, allowing you to create interesting ways to achieve the goals of the underworld. You'll obtain randomized upgrades, challenging you to use different combinations in each game.

Your enemies are also quite powerful. They have their own special heroes who will try to stop you. Expect some challenging encounters with them during your game, they will test your strategic and reaction skills.

content_descriptors.notes: The game will involve hurting human-like creatures.
